title: "I-Seed project for intelligent biodegradable soft robots mimicking plant seeds behaviour"
excerpt: "Researchers in Europe, coordinated by IIT's researcher Barbara Mazzolai, will combine bioinspired soft robotics, material science and artificial intelligence to develop new innovative robots mimicking plant seeds behaviour and able to monitor soil and climate parameters,"
